__e: She withdrew from the world. She won't see anyone.
They retreated behind a fence and made sure the world stayed on the other side.
You have resigned from the business, and who comes to the house and who does not has nothing to do with you.
(Dondo) Once we've retreated... (Dondo) ...send reinforcements... (Dondo) ...to search for the "Sea God"
And I got a feeling when you do, you'll drop this case by the morning.
No, no. No, you don't. Other people might buy your wistful retired-from-life act, but not me.
You're the one that pulled away from me,
And the reason Ajino-sensei gave for turning it down was...
Why don't you ask him why he withdrew from the elections, eh?
